Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Overland Drive, just west of Oceanview Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive is a scenic road which runs from the West Wall towards the Necropolis to the east. The Oceancrest Detention and Rehabilitation Center is located to the north and Dillsdale Memorial Park is located to the south. The Detention Center is more of a maze, as are most administrative institutions.
